entities.name: bertha jorkins
entities.description: Bertha Jorkins is a person who heard Winky talking to the narrator and came to investigate.

entities.name: winky

entities.name: dumbledore

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is a person who talks to Dumbledore and mentions that Winky persuaded his father into attending the Quidditch World Cup.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: The Invisibility Cloak is an object used by the narrator to hide under.

entities.name: quidditch world cup
